      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer

    • landToPlanet

      public void landToPlanet(Integer planetIdx, List<Coordinates> coords, List<Map<BoxType,Integer>> boxes)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Sends a request to the server to land on the specified planet, along with the associated coordinates and boxes to handle during the landing.
      Parameters:
      planetIdx - the index of the target planet where the landing is to be performed
      coords - a list of coordinates indicating the coordinates where boxes must be placed
      boxes - a list of mappings where each map associates a box type with its respective count, representing the items being handled during the landing
